## Learning Objectives

## Goal -- recreate the Bash tool `head` in Python; adding some new functionality 

### skip header

### Intended Code
```{python, eval = FALSE}
import sys
filename = sys.argv[1]
if len(sys.argv) > 2:
  n_lines = int(sys.argv[2])
else:
  n_lines = 10
counter = 0
for line in open(filename):
  if counter < n_lines and not line.startswith("#"):
    print(line, end="")
    counter = counter + 1
```
